item.title: Irosys Venphira
item.description:
Infobox



GOALS/MOTIVATIONS:

Discover and unravel the corruption in the capital
Keeping his family safe
DISLIKES

Overly talkative people
Hates mastication
Being followed
Fear of being poisoned
Being on a team
LIKES:

Kids
His fighting ability
Favorite animal is raccoons


6557 - 6566

Irosys remembers playing tag with his sister and cousins.
Irosys remembers being dolled up by his mother for their family picture day.
Irosys faintly remembers his father's affections towards him.
6566

One morning, with the help of his cousin, he snuck out of his quarters and explored beyond his family's estate for the first time. While he was exploring, his was lured away from a busy street and was kidnapped by a seemingly sweet woman.
Irosys was then indoctrinated into the LoA and enrolled into its young development program. Through this program Irosys was placed on a team with Talia and Dusan, and they were mentored by Gladva.
Irosys was 9 years old at this time.
6579 - Start of Campaign

As part of a long-term mission, Irosys was allowed to return to his family and reintigrate back into high society. He approached his sister and her guards while at the local market plaza in Diamond Heights. He proved his legitimacy by showing his version of their family ring, and he was rushed back to the estate.
His mother and sister immediately welcomed him back into the family, but it took much longer for the remaining close family to do the same. It's only recently that Irosys has been invited to family gatherings, and allowed to socialize unattended at high-profile events.
Any inquiries into the years before his return were met with vague answers and deflections from his mother.




The family estate is essentially the same as in the picture below. The estate is not near a body of water.

Irosys' room within the family estate is essentially the same as in the picture below. The room just needs to be more spacious.




Appearance:

Half-Elf, 31 years old
Personality:

Very kind and is very affectionate towards Irosys
Backstory:

She currently works alongside her and Irosys’ aunt as her assistant

Appearance:

Half-Elf, early-50s
Personality:

She is calculated, smart, and is very protective of her family
Loves her children (almost to a fault) and won’t hear anything negative about them
Backstory:

Her husband married into her family and she is the head of the house
She works as a key board member on the Board of Commerce

Appearance:

Half-Elf, early-50s
Looks like an older version of Irosys, but with a paler complexion and black eyes
Has long brown hair that’s typically styled and slicked back
Personality:

“Walmart ver. of Bruce Wayne”
Backstory:

He married into the Venphira Family via arranged marriage with his wife, but he grew to love her over time
He works at a private accounting firm and is in charge of handling audits
When Irosys returned home, Iglyn struggled to rekindle their close bond. While he loves his son, he keeps Irosys at an arms-length and has a feeling that Irosys is hiding something

D/C
Appearance:
Personality:
Backstory:

She is next-in-line to be the Head Councilman of Treasury

Appearance:

Half-Elf, mid-70s
Has graying hair, black eyes, an olive skin tone, and distinct high cheekbones
Personality:

She is a very stern and private person
Backstory:

She is the current Head Councilman of Treasury
She quite indifferent to her grandson Irosys, and almost views him as an outsider

D/C
Appearance:
Personality:
Backstory:


D/C
Appearance:

Elf, ~100 years old, Warlock
Personality:
Backstory:

Joined the LoA at a very young age and worked her way up the ranks.
She lured Irosys away from his estate when he was young and indoctrinated him into the LoA. She became a motherly figure to him.

D/C
Appearance:

Half-Elf, ~20 years old
Personality:
Backstory:

First met Irosys when she was placed on a team with him and Dusan. The three were mentored by Gladva when they were initially recruited.
Eventually she graduated out of the team, and started doing solo missions thats suited her skillset.
Hasn't kept in contact with Irosys since about three years before the start of the campaign.

D/C
Appearance:

Halfling, late-20s
Personality:
Backstory:

First met Irosys when he was placed on a team with him and Talia. The three were mentored by Gladva when they were initially recruited.
Eventually he graduated out of the team, and started doing solo missions thats suited his skillset.
Four years before the start of the campaign, he stopped doing LoA-specific missions in order to pursue his own personal investigation at his home district.
During the first year of his investigation he kept in contact with Irosys, but hasn't kept in contact since.

item.title: Kaimop
item.description:
Infobox “N/A image.jpeg” could not be found.



GOALS/MOTIVATIONS:

A wanderer by force who’s trying to figure out more to life than just work. Figuring out what he’s supposed to do on 
Making sure people are taken care of well if they deserve it. 
DISLIKES:

People looking down on others
LIKES:

He gets personal satisfaction from a job well done and for when he feels his actions are morally right.


???? (?? years ago)

Before getting kicked out, Kaimop spent most of his time either working at his family’s tavern, mining iron with Dartanian, or doing odd jobs around the neighborhood.
A pastime not relating to work that Kaimop liked to do was repainting the signposts around his neighborhood. A contract miner, he only mined if he was called in. 
6559 (25 years ago)

Jasper found Kaimop near an abandoned railroad station in Copper Lane, Anemone. 
6566 (18 years ago)

Kaimop, Malba, and Dartanian found signposts for the first time.
Kaimop was 7 years old at this time.
6575 (9 years ago)

Kaimop met Mariana and she became, essentially, his second mother. Eventually, he confronted her about the local rumors that he was her child. She denied it, but they kept the ruse amongst their neighbors.
Dartanian started working in the mines.
Kaimop was 16 years old at this time.
6578 (6 years ago)

Gabriel, Mariana’s fiance, died in a mining accident. 
Kaimop was 19 years old at this time.
6581 (3 years ago)

York arrived in town and became fast friends with Kaimop.
Kaimop was 22 years old at this time.
6584 (3 to 4 months ago)

Kaimop’s family essentially kicked him out of the house and tell him to discover something more to life than just working. They view him as an empty shell that needs to be filled with something more than just a work ethic. They think Kaimop needs to live a better life than what he’s currently living.




The home is located behind the family-owned tavern. One story with five modest bedrooms (each bedroom includes a bed, drawers & a small closet). The living/dining room is the centerpiece of the home and is decently sized.
Jasper/Perna, Becian/Drea, Malba, and Peony each have rooms, and Calca has a crib set up in Kaimop’s room.
The small rooms don’t bother anyone, and usually, a tavern bedroom is reserved for whoever works the night shift.



Appearance:

Human, 18 years old
Brown hair, light brown eyes, and has a cute but chic-like vibe
Wears colorful/unorthodox but fashionable clothes and follows her own vibes
Personality:

Sweet most of the time but can have a bite when messed with
Is dense when it comes to her love life
Backstory:

Adores Kaimop and is very fond of Dartanian. In Kaimop's absence she's continued painting street signs.

Appearance:

Human, 26 years old
Brown hair, hazel eyes, and her prettiness is often commented on
Wears simple tavern work clothes and gives off "girl with a messy bun" vibes
Personality:

Boisterous and snarky/sassy, but there's a sense of class to herself
Backstory:

She is quite close to Kaimop and was the one who taught him to cook when he was younger.
She's in love with (one-sided) with Dartanian, but is seemingly trying to move on by hanging out more with York.

Appearance:

Human, 55 years old
Light brown hair and dark brown eyes. Has a clean look about him and wears quality clothes for the area.
Personality:

Calm, collected, and is seen as a nice guy in the community. Is a known haggler. 
Backstory:

Before meeting Perna, he was known for running the streets and getting into all sorts of stupid trouble. When he wasn’t running around he worked as the bartender at his family’s tavern.
After meeting Perna, he eventually fell in love with her eagerness/love of adventure and married her. The neighbors know about him and his wife in bed and even ask Jasper for tips. All but one (Kaimop) of his three children know.

Appearance:

Human, 53 years old
Light sandy hair and light brown eyes. Dresses cleanly and functionally. 
Personality:

Bubbly, loud, and straightforward, yet surprisingly gentle when need be.
Backstory:

Perna traveled up north from Brasscroft looking for adventure. Quickly, she found herself broke and spent her days at a tavern in Copper Lane.
The tavern’s bartender, Jasper, caught her eye, but she gave up pursuing him at first when he didn’t see her romantically. She eventually got a job at that tavern as a cook and made Copper Lane her home. The bartender fell in love with her and married her.

Appearance:

Human, 31 years old
Dark brown hair and dark brown eyes.
Wears quality clothing for the area, but is seen more often in his bartending outfit. 
Personality:

Has a snarky exterior but a caring interior.
He is a well-known planner, and has contingencies for nearly everything he does.
Backstory:

Becian cares/worries deeply for Kaimop, but his prickly exterior personality sometimes gets in the way of showing that. He was the biggest voice in pushing Kaimop to leave the district, which has caused a strain on their relationship.
He is inline to inherit the tavern, but he wants to eventually give it to Kaimop and pursue his career as a banker. Already has money invested in {blank} and waiting for Kaimop to be in good enough shape so he can leave the tavern to him worry-free. Becian is married to Drea and they have a child named Calca. DM EYES ONLY fill in the blank

Appearance:

Human, 4 years old
Soft wispy brown hair like her father and green eyes like her mother. Very squishy.
Personality:

A very happy baby. She rarely cries and most often can be seen with a smile on her face. Loves drawing (or maybe just the colors).
Background:

Was a happy accident. Her parents love her unconditionally.

Appearance:

Human, 31 years old
Pale green eyes and wavy auburn-brown hair that’s usually in a braid. She has sun-kissed skin with faint freckles around the nose. She gives off “Southern Belle” vibes.  
Personality:

She is sweet as can be, but is highly protective of what she considers hers. Always has something to say and loves having the last word.
Background:

Met Becain while he was rushing to attend a banking seminar a district over. In a very rom-com way, he bumped into her, which caused her to spill her drink all over his shirt. He offered to buy her another drink, and she offered him her afternoon. They talked all day, and Becian never made it to the banking seminar. Becian eventually married her and they have a child named Calca.


Appearance

Human, 42 years old
Sandy blond hair and pale brown eyes. Wears clothes that are well worn and well-loved.
Personality:

Quiet and soft-spoken around most folks. Becomes visibly nervous in unfamiliar situations, but can push through most of the time.
Background:

Mariana has lived in Copper Lane all her life, and is locally known as the woman who sold her newborn baby to a noble. Neighbors assumed that Kaimop was that newborn baby because he was often seen trailing after her when he was younger.
Eventually, he confronted her about the rumors, and she assured him that he was not her biological son. She begged Kaimop to keep the truth a secret because it would be easier for everyone, and he agreed. A few years later, Kaimop was her biggest support when her fiance died in the mines. During this time, Kaimop learned about the abuse she suffered from her ex-husband years before she met her fiance.

Appearance:

Half-Orc, 22 years old
Dark green skin, black wavy hair, and gray eyes. Has a boyish charm to him and dresses neatly.
Personality:

Naturally boisterous and is known to give into his chaotic tendencies.
Background:

Started working in the copper mines when he was 16 years old, and has a history/backstory commonly seen in Copper Lane. He has known Kaimop’s family for years, and has pinned for Peony for almost as long as he’s known her.
When they were younger, Kaimop, Malba and him were the three musketeers. The trio would often be seen redesigning the signs all over the neighborhood. Soon after Kaimop left, Dartanian gently turned down Malba’s affections, and hasn’t seen much of her since. He talks to Peony the most out of Kaimop’s family now, but they really only met to recolor signs. He seems quite lonely.

Appearance:

Human, 28 years old
Bronze skin, black curly hair, and light brown eyes.
No matter what he wears, there always seems to be oil/grease stains on it. (Leo Valdez aesthetic.) 
Personality:

A man of few words. Gruff, but incredibly kind. Values loyalty and familial bonds. Can be very talkative when he gets passionate about a subject. 
Backstory:

York moved from his home district of {blank}, 3 years before the start of the campaign due to his parents’ passing. Before working in the mines, he was the local handyman in his neighborhood.
Soon after moving to Copper Lane, York met Kaimop while mining and became fast friends. They could go a whole day without saying a word to each other and they enjoy their shared silence. Before Kaimop started his journey, York offered to join him but Kaimop told him to stay home to watch over everyone. After having her advances rejected by Dartanian, Malba has started hanging out with York. DM EYES ONLY fill in the blank

item.title: Winona Elledyr
item.description:
Infobox credit @Loreaigne


Elledyr pronounced [EH-LEH-DEER]
Has Orb of Ponderance:



GOALS/MOTIVATIONS:

Figure out what to do with her life (currently settled on law school)
Learn how and why she got a warlock pact
Simply be able to help people
DISLIKES:

Major religious institutions / figures, (authority in general?),
Waking up early,
Her hair turning white
Insects
Having nothing to do
LIKES:

Reading (wild mix of fantasy, fiction, and biographies),
Stargazing
Graffiti
Taking naps yet staying up late
Staying busy
Taking care of stray animals
Apple juice


FEB 8, 6539

Wynn was born as a sickly baby in her family home.
6547

Wynn's father retired as a cleric at The Oasis to spend more time with his family. He opened his own private health clinic close to home. Although the family still goes to the temple every week. DM Question does the health clinic have a quirky name? or are you leaving it up to DM?
During this year, Wynn finished Basics and continued her education at the library with the help of her mother and other library staff.
Wynn was 8 years old at this time. DM EYES ONLY figure out Basics link here!
6553 - 6581

Wynn spent this time bouncing between jobs to support her family. She worked part-time at the library her mother works at, helped her father with administration work and the family clinic, and worked night shifts at a local tavern. DM Question
did Wynn's father hire anyone else at the family clinic? if he did, are they important in any way? or are you leaving it up to DM?
is the local tavern important to Wynn in anyway? same questions as ones above
Towards the end of this period of Wynn's life, she grew bored and a bit stir crazy and was looking to do more with her life. She began looking into clerical training because of three main factors:
Her childhood friend had just recently gotten an apprenticeship and was encouraging her to join
Being a sickly child growing up
Watching her father help others as a cleric of the Waterbearer
Wynn was 14 to 42 years old during this time period.
6581

Wynn started her cleric training and became a student under {blank} (2). She was perceived as a 'late bloomer' due to her inability to use magic.
Wynn was 42 years old at this time.
DEC 30, 6583

Wynn was summoned to The Oasis and subsequently expelled from clerical training. In a fit of anger, Wynn stole a mace off of a statue in the temple, and was never seen there again.
Wynn was 44 years old at this time.
JAN 5, 6584

Wynn went through a week of existential sulking and religious guilt before she gave herself a haircut for a "fresh look, fresh start." The haircut turned out so bad she shaved half of her head in a panic by accident.
JAN 8, 6584

Wynn had a strange dream this night where she was alone in a void and heard a voice ask her, "Do you want to help people?" Wynn said yes and immediately jolted awake, but then quickly went back to sleep. DM EYES ONLY fill in the deets
JAN 9, 6584

Wynn casted Eldritch Blast at her morning coffee by accident. Later in the day, she noticed that a streak of white hair had formed at the back of her head. She decided to keep her newfound abilities secret.
JAN 10, 6584 - Start of Campaign

Wynn spent most of her time in libraries secretly reading about magic, and she eventually came to the conclusion that she had unintentionally signed a Warlock Pact. From then on she kept a journal that tracked any accidental uses of magic and strange occurrences. While reading about magic, Wynn stumbled upon cases of unfair and/or dangerous pacts, which inspired her to apply for law school.
Wynn was 45 years old at this time.




Humble, old little home that has seen better days. Two stories with a basement. Kinda looks like the home of a really nice grandma: old but comforting, and filled with trinkets. Wynn’s bedroom looks like a time capsule from her teenage years, notably full of filled diaries, musings, her favorite books, crafts, and a homemade shrine to the Tempest that looks like it was made by a child.



Appearance:

High Elf, ~400 years old, Cleric
Red fluffy hair, fluffy mustache, blue eyes, warm skin
Typically wears a collared shirt with a tie
“doctor who’s too casual” vibes
Personality:

Very generous, patient and empathetic
A casual follower of the Waterbearer
Backstory:

Retired cleric of The Oasis. He is currently running a health clinic that serves the community, particularly those of lower-income

Appearance:

Human, 71 years old
Grey hair, brown eyes, freckles, light skin, prominent laughter lines
Typically wears flowy clothes
“looks her age”
Personality:

A calming and comforting presence
“sweet old lady vibes”; “calls people around her ‘dear’”; “is quick to offer tea”
Backstory:

Retired from being a full-time librarian, but still volunteers at {blank} DM Question name of library? vibes of library? general location of library?
She inspired Wynn’s love of books, and gave her ample book-borrowing privileges


Appearance:

Hill Dwarf, 44 years old (mentally mid-20s)
{blank} DM Question appearance? or are you leaving it up to DM?
Personality:

Level-headed, organized, and polite
Has a professional demeanor, but loosens up around friends
Backstory:

She met Wynn are a local library when they were kids and bonded over their shared love of books
She recently graduated from apprenticeship, and is now a full-time record keeper at a satellite temple of the Waterbearer in {blank} DM Question location of the satellite temple? or are you leaving it up to DM?
She hasn't seen Wynn since she stormed out of The Oasis, but they are still besties

Appearance:

Wood Elf, ~ 450 years old
{blank} DM Question name of mentor? appearance? or are you leaving it up to DM?
Personality:

Strict and highly religious
Backstory:

He is Head Cleric at The Oasis and formerly worked with Wynn's father. He was Wynn's mentor during her clerical training and became frustrated with Wynn's inability to cleric.
Their mentor-student dynamic soured over the years, which eventually lead to him kicking Wynn out of clerical training and Wynn storming away.

item.title: Thia Aldershine
item.description:
Infobox “N/A image.png” could not be found.



GOALS/MOTIVATIONS:

 
DISLIKES:


LIKES:




SEP 21, 6114

Thia's father was born as a Lower Roots member along the outskirts of the Woodland Clan Estate.
JAN 1, 6134

Thia's mother was born as a Upper Branches member near the center of the Woodland Clan Estate. DM EYES ONLY figure out Lower Roots/Upper Branches here!
APR 30, 6334

Thia's mother and father met each other in passing at the yearly Spring Festival, and begun to court each other in secret. DM EYES ONLY link spring Festival? maybe give a fancy name?
OCT 23, 6334

Thia's mother and Finch Woodroot became fast friends due to their respective courtships with Thia's father and Tuller Mayflower.
DEC 10, 6354

After a borderline-forbidden courtship, Thia's mother and father marry without the approval of the Hearthsong Family. They married at the The Oasis with only the Aldershine Family, Tuller Mayflower and Finch Woodroot in attendance.
NOV 27, 6384

Thia was born when her father and mother were 270 and 250 years old, respectively. She was born as a Lower Roots member.
MAY 5, 6434

Thia's sister was born as a Lower Roots member.
JUL 18, 6435

Thia's father passed away due to an undiagnosed illness. It rapidly progressed over a period of 3 months before killing him in his sleep.
AUG 12, 6435

Thia enrolled at a private Basics school. At Basics she didn't make a lot of friends due to her looking down on non-elves, and those of the Upper Branches looking down on her. Thia's sister attended a Basics school closer to home.
MAY 18, 6448

Thia graduated from Basics.
SEP 23, 6448

Thia started interning for different boards in the Council of Eora. DM Question which different boards?
AUG 18, 6582

Thia began college at Tulane.
MAR 11, 6584

Thia returned home for Spring Break to find her mother and sister gone. The only clue she found regarding their disappearance was a mysterious note that was left that told Thia to meet at The Last Line Tavern on the 14th.
MAY 14, 6584

The campaign starts.






Appearance

Wood Elf, 150 years old (mentally late-teens)
Light blonde hair


Appearance:

Wood Elf
Personality:
Backstory:

Backstory

Tuller Mayflower is his childhood friend.


Appearance:
Personality:


Backstory:
